[i]Augmented[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, you may activate one of Glitch's loyalty abilities.
[+1]: You gain 3 life and draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
[-3]: Exile target nonland permanent. Glitch gains its activated and triggered abilities.
[-6]: Choose a number. Each player sacrifices that many nonland, non-Glitch permanents.
